<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/470adb827f3d9e6cf62f685738d2db216daf3738|patch 8.2.1254: MS-Windows: regexp test may fail if 'iskeyword' set w…>
patch 8.2.1254: MS-Windows: regexp test may fail if 'iskeyword' set wrongly

Problem:    MS-Windows: regexp test may fail if 'iskeyword' set wrongly.
Solution:   Override the 'iskeyword' value. (Taro Muraoka, closes #6502)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1254: MS-Windows: regexp test may fail if 'iskeyword' set w… · vim/vim@470adb8
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1254: MS-Windows: regexp test may fail if 'iskeyword' set w… · vim/vim@470adb8
attachments.text: …rongly Problem: MS-Windows: regexp test may fail if 'iskeyword' set wrongly. Solution: Override the 'iskeyword' value. (Taro Muraoka, closes #6502)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/d43906d2e5969288f239df851f5ad7b1dc2c7251|patch 8.2.1255: cannot use a lambda with quickfix functions>
patch 8.2.1255: cannot use a lambda with quickfix functions

Problem:    Cannot use a lambda with quickfix functions.
Solution:   Add support for lambda. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #6499)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1255: cannot use a lambda with quickfix functions · vim/vim@d43906d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1255: cannot use a lambda with quickfix functions · vim/vim@d43906d
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot use a lambda with quickfix functions. Solution: Add support for lambda. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #6499)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7892b953e0e496408008434ae3505293c0c93af1|patch 8.2.1256: Vim9: type wrong after getting dict item in lambda>
patch 8.2.1256: Vim9: type wrong after getting dict item in lambda

Problem:    Vim9: type wrong after getting dict item in lambda.
Solution:   Set the type to "any" after enforcing dict type. (closes #6491)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1256: Vim9: type wrong after getting dict item in lambda · vim/vim@7892b95
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1256: Vim9: type wrong after getting dict item in lambda · vim/vim@7892b95
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: type wrong after getting dict item in lambda. Solution: Set the type to "any" after enforcing dict type. (closes #6491)

patch 8.2.1257: Vim9: list unpack doesn't work at the script level

Problem:    Vim9: list unpack doesn't work at the script level.
Solution:   Detect unpack assignment better. (closes #6494)

attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: list unpack doesn't work at the script level. Solution: Detect unpack assignment better. (closes #6494)

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/08815a1d0350fbcc007aea5dd1272454c03fab4f|patch 8.2.1258: CursorHold does not work well>
patch 8.2.1258: CursorHold does not work well

Problem:    CursorHold does not work well.a (Shane-XB-Qian)
Solution:   Only restore did_cursorhold when using :normal.
